name: Pan
description:
IPCA Game Jam 2017 Entry

Pan is a game about a boy of the same name, that revisits some old memories after finding his deceased grandfather's glasses. But this memories were changed by his imagination. This game is a reflection about mourning and pain. His journey through time is a metaphor for the thoughts and memories that his granfather's glasses bring him. This game is also a reflection on the easily impressed mind of a child.

Controls:
Arrows to walk.
Hold shift to run.
Enter to interact.
